params.description:
Apply Params to all Pages matching Target. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/cascade/#params

fields.description:
Fields holds all fields but Params. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/cascade/#fields

path.description:
A Glob pattern matching the content path below /content.
Expects Unix-styled slashes.
Note that this is the virtual path, so it starts at the mount root
with a leading "/". 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/cascade/#path

kind.description:
A Glob pattern matching the Page's Kind(s), e.g. "{home,section}" 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/cascade/#kind

lang.description:
A Glob pattern matching the Page's language, e.g. "{en,sv}". 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/cascade/#lang

environment.description:
A Glob pattern matching the Page's Environment, e.g. "{production,development}". 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/cascade/#environment

target.description:
Target is the PageMatcher that this config applies to. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/cascade/#target
